verses.verse: קִרְב֤וּ <S%H7126><s%> Come near גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> ye nations לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> ye people הַקְשִׁ֑יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> and hearken תִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> hear הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> let the earth וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> and all that is therein תֵּבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> the world וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צֶאֱצָאֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6631><s%> and all things that come forth

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for קֶ֤צֶף <S%H7110><s%> For the indignation לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> [is] upon all nations וְחֵמָ֖ה <S%H2534><s%> and [his] fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָאָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> upon all their armies הֶחֱרִימָ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> he hath utterly destroyed נְתָנָ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> them he hath delivered לַטָּֽבַח׃ <S%H2874><s%> them to the slaughter

וְחַלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H2491><s%> Their slain יֻשְׁלָ֔כוּ <S%H7993><s%> also shall be cast out וּפִגְרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6297><s%> out of their carcases יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up בָאְשָׁ֑ם <S%H889><s%> and their stink וְנָמַ֥סּוּ <S%H4549><s%> shall be melted הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains מִדָּמָֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> with their blood

וְנָמַ֙קּוּ֙ <S%H4743><s%> shall be dissolved כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> And all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְנָגֹ֥לּוּ <S%H1556><s%> shall be rolled together כַסֵּ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> as a scroll הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> and the heavens וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All צְבָאָ֣ם <S%H6635><s%> and all their host יִבּ֔וֹל <S%H5034><s%> shall fall down כִּנְבֹ֤ל <S%H5034><s%> falleth off עָלֶה֙ <S%H5929><s%> as the leaf מִגֶּ֔פֶן <S%H1612><s%> from the vine וּכְנֹבֶ֖לֶת <S%H5034><s%> and as a falling מִתְּאֵנָֽה׃ <S%H8384><s%> [fig] from the fig tree

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רִוְּתָ֥ה <S%H7301><s%> shall be bathed בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> in heaven חַרְבִּ֑י <S%H2719><s%> For my sword הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> upon Idumea תֵּרֵ֔ד <S%H3381><s%> behold it shall come down וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and upon עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and upon the people חֶרְמִ֖י <S%H2764><s%> of my curse לְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> to judgment

חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> The sword לַיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> is filled דָם֙ <S%H1818><s%> with blood הֻדַּ֣שְׁנָה <S%H1878><s%> it is made fat מֵחֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> with fatness מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> [and] with the blood כָּרִים֙ <S%H3733><s%> of lambs וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <S%H6260><s%> and goats מֵחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> with the fat כִּלְי֣וֹת <S%H3629><s%> of the kidneys אֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> of rams כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> has a זֶ֤בַח <S%H2077><s%> hath a sacrifice לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּבָצְרָ֔ה <S%H1224><s%> in Bozrah וְטֶ֥בַח <S%H2874><s%> slaughter גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and a great בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> of Idumea

וְיָרְד֤וּ <S%H3381><s%> shall come down רְאֵמִים֙ <S%H7214><s%> And the unicorns עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> them וּפָרִ֖ים <S%H6499><s%> with them and the bullocks עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אַבִּירִ֑ים <S%H47><s%> with the bulls וְרִוְּתָ֤ה <S%H7301><s%> shall be soaked אַרְצָם֙ <S%H776><s%> and their land מִדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> with blood וַעֲפָרָ֖ם <S%H6083><s%> and their dust מֵחֵ֥לֶב <S%H2459><s%> with fatness יְדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <S%H1878><s%> made fat

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> has a י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For [it is] the day נָקָ֖ם <S%H5359><s%> vengeance לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> [and] the year שִׁלּוּמִ֖ים <S%H7966><s%> of recompences לְרִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> for the controversy צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion

וְנֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <S%H2015><s%> thereof shall be turned נְחָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5158><s%> And the streams לְזֶ֔פֶת <S%H2203><s%> into pitch וַעֲפָרָ֖הּ <S%H6083><s%> and the dust לְגָפְרִ֑ית <S%H1614><s%> thereof into brimstone וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become אַרְצָ֔הּ <S%H776><s%> and the land לְזֶ֖פֶת <S%H2203><s%> pitch בֹּעֵרָֽה׃ <S%H1197><s%> thereof shall become burning

לַ֤יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night וְיוֹמָם֙ <S%H3119><s%> nor day לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִכְבֶּ֔ה <S%H3518><s%> It shall not be quenched לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> thereof shall go up עֲשָׁנָ֑הּ <S%H6227><s%> the smoke מִדּ֤וֹר <S%H1755><s%> from generation לָדוֹר֙ <S%H1755><s%> to generation תֶּחֱרָ֔ב <S%H2717><s%> it shall lie waste לְנֵ֣צַח <S%H5331><s%> it for ever נְצָחִ֔ים <S%H5331><s%> and ever אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> None עֹבֵ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> none shall pass through בָּֽהּ׃

וִירֵשׁ֙וּהָ֙ <S%H3423><s%> shall possess קָאַ֣ת <S%H6893><s%> But the cormorant וְקִפּ֔וֹד <S%H7090><s%> and the bittern וְיַנְשׁ֥וֹף <S%H3244><s%> it the owl וְעֹרֵ֖ב <S%H6158><s%> also and the raven יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell בָ֑הּ וְנָטָ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> in it and he shall stretch out עָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5921><s%> over קַֽו־ <S%H6957><s%> upon it the line תֹ֖הוּ <S%H8414><s%> of confusion וְאַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> and the stones בֹֽהוּ׃ <S%H922><s%> of emptiness

חֹרֶ֥יהָ <S%H2715><s%> the nobles וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there מְלוּכָ֣ה <S%H4410><s%> thereof to the kingdom יִקְרָ֑אוּ <S%H7121><s%> They shall call וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> its שָׂרֶ֖יהָ <S%H8269><s%> but none [shall be] there and all her princes יִ֥הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> become אָֽפֶס׃ <S%H657><s%> shall be nothing

וְעָלְתָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up אַרְמְנֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H759><s%> in her palaces סִירִ֔ים <S%H5518><s%> And thorns קִמּ֥וֹשׂ <S%H7057><s%> nettles וָח֖וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> and brambles בְּמִבְצָרֶ֑יהָ <S%H4013><s%> in the fortresses וְהָיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will also be a נְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> thereof and it shall be an habitation תַנִּ֔ים <S%H8577><s%> of dragons חָצִ֖יר <S%H2681><s%> [and] a court לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> first יַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H3284><s%> of ostriches

וּפָגְשׁ֤וּ <S%H6298><s%> shall also meet צִיִּים֙ <S%H6728><s%> The wild beasts of the desert אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אִיִּ֔ים <S%H338><s%> with the wild beasts of the island וְשָׂעִ֖יר <S%H8163><s%> and the satyr עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto רֵעֵ֣הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his fellow יִקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> shall cry אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Yes שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הִרְגִּ֣יעָה <S%H7280><s%> also shall rest לִּילִ֔ית <S%H3917><s%> the screech owl וּמָצְאָ֥ה <S%H4672><s%> there and find לָ֖הּ מָנֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H4494><s%> for herself a place of rest

שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there קִנְּנָ֤ה <S%H7077><s%> make her nest קִפּוֹז֙ <S%H7091><s%> There shall the great owl וַתְּמַלֵּ֔ט <S%H4422><s%> and lay וּבָקְעָ֖ה <S%H1234><s%> and hatch וְדָגְרָ֣ה <S%H1716><s%> and gather בְצִלָּ֑הּ <S%H6738><s%> under her shadow אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Yes שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there נִקְבְּצ֥וּ <S%H6908><s%> also be gathered דַיּ֖וֹת <S%H1772><s%> there shall the vultures אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> every one רְעוּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7468><s%> with her mate

דִּרְשׁ֨וּ <S%H1875><s%> Seek ye out מֵֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> from סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the book יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּֽקְרָ֔אוּ <S%H7121><s%> and read אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> no one מֵהֵ֙נָּה֙ <S%H2007><s%> of these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נֶעְדָּ֔רָה <S%H5737><s%> shall fail אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> none רְעוּתָ֖הּ <S%H7468><s%> her mate לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not פָקָ֑דוּ <S%H6485><s%> shall want כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For פִי֙ <S%H6310><s%> for my mouth ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> it hath commanded וְרוּח֖וֹ <S%H7307><s%> and his spirit ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he קִבְּצָֽן׃ <S%H6908><s%> it hath gathered

וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He הִפִּ֤יל <S%H5307><s%> And he hath cast לָהֶן֙ <S%H1992><s%> like גּוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> the lot וְיָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> for them and his hand חִלְּקַ֥תָּה <S%H2505><s%> hath divided לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> by בַּקָּ֑ו <S%H6957><s%> it unto them by line עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> it for עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> ever יִֽירָשׁ֔וּהָ <S%H3423><s%> they shall possess לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> from generation וָד֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> to generation יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> shall they dwell בָֽהּ׃ ס
